scripts.build: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t build -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk --parallel=5
scripts.build:lite: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t build:lite -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor --parallel=3
scripts.deploy: shx rm -rf ../publish/web && pnpm nx run-many -t deploy -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk --parallel=5 && shx cp -r public ../publish/web/ && node common/scripts/minify-common-locales.js
scripts.start: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t start -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk --parallel=5
scripts.start-prod: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t start-prod -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk --parallel=5
scripts.start-prod:lite: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t start-prod -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor --parallel=3
scripts.wipe: pnpm nx reset && shx rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml packages/**/node_modules
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm run lint && pnpm run tsc && cd ./common/tests && npm install && npm run test:images && npm run test:colors && npm run test:dependencies
